scripts.postinstall: rm -fr ./public/vendor && mkdir -p ./public/vendor/mozilla &&  mkdir -p ./public/vendor/mrrio && mkdir -p ./public/vendor/moment && cp -R ./node_modules/pdfjs-dist ./public/vendor/mozilla/pdf.js && cp -R ./node_modules/jspdf ./public/vendor/mrrio/jspdf && cp -R ./node_modules/moment ./public/vendor/moment && cp -R ./node_modules/@bevacqua ./public/vendor/bevacqua
